title: Doctor.ai - A next Gen AI Doctor.
description: Doctor.ai is an intelligent diagnostic assistant that leverages AI to analyze patient symptoms and lab data, delivering instant disease predictions with precise probability scores. Beyond diagnosis, it generates comprehensive, curative health plans—covering nutrition, lifestyle, and medication—to actively accelerate user recovery. Built with Next.js and FastAPI, the platform ensures a seamless, responsive experience for accessible personal health management.

title: AiSocial
description: AI-powered social media platform with multimodal tools, real-time chat, and scalable architecture.

title: HK Signature
description: Full-stack custom signature e-commerce platform with AI-powered content generation, complete admin CMS, and robust order management.

title: ResearcherX - Agentic Web Researcher
description: AI Research Agent is an autonomous AI system that conducts web research, analyzes multiple sources, and generates structured research reports from a single prompt using agent-based workflows.

title: Generative AI Studio
description: A unified AI platform combining Google Gemini for text and Hugging Face FLUX.1 for image generation in a secure, modern interface.

title: AI Expense Tracker
description: Smart financial tracking app using Google Gemini 2.0 for automated receipt parsing, interactive analytics, and secure Google OAuth.
